title: ASHES TO ASHES: Acrostic Poetry Collection - #LuaViEr
description: Crafted with careObliging acrostic rulesLines gushing from my soulLaced with passionEmotionsCheerful at timesTormented and painful alsoIn poetic formOpening my heart I amNarrating my thoughts to you.This collection contains fifty-six poems inspired by various topics. Visit my website for CW.
author: Luana Giunta
